revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=EnGenius |model=ESR1750 |revision= |series=AC1750 |upc=655216006447 |asin=B00E5CL6HK |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |est_release_date=08/2013 |fcc_date=12/27/2013 |fcc_id=A8JESR1750, A8JESR1200, A8JESR900 |ic_id=10103A-ESR1750 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558 |cpu1_cspeed=720 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU64M16DG-AC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header; 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9558;QCA9558-AT4A, PMV137.005B, 1252, TAIWAN; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module=Senao PAC3300 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880;QCA9880-BR4A, NGB639.001C, 1328, KOREA; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337N;QCA8337N-AL3C; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz High-Power High-Gain Power Amplifier;Silicon Storage Technology;SST12LP15A;;3;,,, 3A 23V Step-Down Converter;M3Tek;IT76630M;;1; |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.0.0; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31;LSDK-10.1.45; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=EnGeniusXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^EnGenius[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=88:DC:96 |oui_eth=88:DC:96 }} {{TagLine|Dual Band Wireless AC1750 Router}} :''with Gigabit Ports, USB, Quantum Beam, and EnShare'' :[http://engeniustech.com/home-networking/routers/16743-esr1750 Product page] {{•}} [http://www.engeniustech.com/resources/ESR1750_DS_071013.pdf Datasheet] "ESR1750-0.20 LFP" is silkscreened on the mainboard in the FCC photos. :"PAC3300-0.20 LFP 94V-0 1343" is silkscreened on the wireless module. The FCC ID on the label on at least some of these devices appears to be A8JESR900. :The newer A8JESR1750 FCC ID was issued before the end of 2013. The filings for FCC ID do indeed mention the ESR1750 and ESR1200 within the test report… :but only 802.11n rates seem to be tested (there is no mention of 80MHz/VHT modes) :and the photos cover the ESR900 only (w/ its 3x3 11an AR9580 radio). Default settings (including the SSID formats and the presumed used 88:DC:96 OUI) :are per the FCC sample label. Additional specifications, per ''[[EnGenius]]'''s product page, follow... *Weight: 0.5 lbs *Diameter: 6.36" *Height: 1.64" ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32232-engenius-dual-band-wireless-ac1750-cloud-gigabit-router-with-usb-port-and-enshare-reviewed ''EnGenius Dual Band Wireless AC1750 Cloud Gigabit Router Reviewed'' on '''SNB'''] :*CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9558 @720MHz 3T3R 802.11n WiSoC :*RAM: 128 MB (??), Flash: 16 MB :*2.4GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9558 :- 2.4 GHz Power Amp [http://ww1.microchip.com/downloads/en/DeviceDoc/S71291.pdf ''SST'' 12LP15A] (x3) :*5GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9880 :- 5 GHz Power Amp marked 15E37TV (x3) :*Switch: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8337 ===Links=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32178-engenius-launches-80211ac-line ''EnGenius Launches 802.11ac Line'' on '''SNB'''] *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/engenius/esr1750 ''EnGenius ESR1750'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] (bootlog) ===Serial=== {{SCollapse|Bootlog • >> |
